channel.title: Two hundred a day plus expenses
channel.description: Hello, It's been a while since I didn't hear of Master Ravachol's new works. I liked following Lincoln Green journey through the woods but nothing came out, or so it seems. So I took to track tracks and found this : one conference for Make talk play and, lo : a trekkie podcast series with Nathan D. Paoletta. Anyone knows about it ? ... or what came of Lincoln Green ?

item.title: Two hundred a day plus expenses
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

The ‘Trekkie podcast’ is actually a Rockford Files podcast that does a once-a-year Star Trek episode as a gentle, running April Fools gag.

As far as I know Eppie is still plugging away at Lincoln Green; he generally has several irons in the fire at any given time, and his stuff drops when it drops and not on any sort of aggressive regular schedule.

Read full topic
item.source: Two hundred a day plus expenses

item.title: Two hundred a day plus expenses

item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

Hello,
It’s been a while since I didn’t hear of Master Ravachol’s new works. I liked following Lincoln Green journey through the woods but nothing came out, or so it seems. So I took to track tracks and found this : one conference for Make talk play and, lo : a trekkie podcast series with Nathan D. Paoletta.
Anyone knows about it ? … or what came of Lincoln Green ?
